alert.note: Alert for Furnas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 2:43PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Furnas County through 315 PM CDT... At 242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wilsonville to 10 miles east of Lebanon. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cambridge and Wilsonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
